name: Nuclear Night
description:
Summary:

Our late night staff at the power plant have their lives on the line tonight. The generator that keeps power to crucial systems appears to have gone down and remaining power cells only have 5 minutes worth of power. You must find your way out of the power plant or fix the cause of the issue. The choice is yours.

Controls:

E - Interact with items / or in some cases use item

Spacebar - advance text or push/bull boxes(hold space)

WASD or arrow keys to move

Mouse is used for keypad
